contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 17th day of January, 2001, the order of the court of common pleas, which reinstated appellee’s driving privileges on the basis that 75 Pa.C.S. § 1584 is unconstitutional, is reversed, and the case is remanded for proceedings consistent with Harrington v. Department of Transportation, 563 Pa. 565, 763 A.2d 386 (2000).
